DOC.brief_summary: Purpose : Determine short-term safety intravitreal bevacizumab multifocal electroretinography ( mf-ERG ) . Methods : 120 eye choroidal neovascularization , proliferative diabetic retinopathy retinal vein occlusion receive intravitreal bevacizumab ( 2.5mg/0.1cc ) . All patient underwent best correct visual acuity , fluorescein angiography , optical coherent tomography mf-ERG 1 month treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Multifocal Electrophysiologic Findings After Intravitreal Bevacizumab ( Avastin ) Treatment
DOC.criteria: Proliferative diabetic retinopathy , vascular vein oclussion , choroidal neovascularization Multifocal electroretinogram intravitreal bevacizumab 1,3 , 6 month treatment Completely study Complications Tractional Detachment Endophthalmitis
